full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Information

* **Title (English)**: Supply and Installation of Insulation on MV Madeleine II
* **Title (Français)**: Approvisionnement et installation d'isolant sur le MV Madeleine II
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS4200134756-Doc4298065282
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4200134756
* **Publication Date**: November 8, 2023

#### Call for Tenders

 Transport Canada is issuing a Call for Tenders for the supply, delivery and installation of insulation onboard the MV Madeleine II. The procurement will be conducted using a Competitive Open Bidding method, and the Contracting Entity is Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

#### Tender Overview

* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 30, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not yet specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Souris

#### Goods and Services Description

* **Description**: The contract requires the supply, delivery, and installation of insulation onboard MV Madeleine II. The insulation must be delivered within 28 weeks of contract award and installed no later than December 20, 2025.

#### Notice

A notice requesting Proposals (Demande de propositions) for the supply of insulation on the MV Madeleine II can be found on the Discovery Ariba website, available at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17952999?extsite=MTc5NTI5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:
Christopher Young, PSPC
christopher.young@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: Extra details are here because once a tender closes, the current results will not be edited to be full text or removed from the panelists who bid. Rewrite here will in used cases, it is possible that a reformatted change rather than all text is possible to get hereby considered.
